website_summaries.verdict: A truly tear-free shampoo that's great for children of all ages.
pros: Large bottle lasts a long time
Gentle, yet strong enough to detangle hair
cons: A few have said it left their child's hair a little greasy

customer_reviews.title: Coconut free shampoo that works great!
customer_reviews.text: One of the very few shampoos without some derivative of coconut, which I am allergic to. Works well on my fine hair. Since it is made for children (but I'm in my 40's) and very mild, I usually lather up and let it sit on my hair while showering to ensure a thorough clean. Great for children and grown-ups.... especially for those allergic to coconut!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great hair cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great hair cleaner, especially if your child has long or thick hair. The scent is very similar to Johnson & Johnson. This does not come with a pump so we used a spare that we had. The bottle can still be used with out a pump. We have tried other brands but this seems to clean the best without drying my daughters hair. This product is 100% tear free. I was worried about this but some shampoo went over my LO eyes, she just wiped it off.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: We really like this shampoo. It's gentle, rinses easily, but is effective even on fairly thick hair. Has a nice light scent, and is tear free. It's somewhat pricy but since you don't have to use much (even on my daughter's very long hair) the bottle lasts a very long time. Doesn't dry out their hair or scalp either.
customer_reviews.author: jpgm11

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best shampoo for babies up to adults its got such ...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best shampoo for babies up to adults its got such a low ph balance it can be used on dogs!!! Multi purposes shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lane

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. It does not have a scent, thank God! Scented hair products give me a thundering headache. Some products claim to be unscented, but that only means the company didn't add scent to it. By that definition, a skunk's spray is unscented. It cleans well without drying out my hair. Takes a little more to get big suds, but that's okay with me. Best of all Paul Mitchell products are cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: RabbitRescuer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shampoo for little ones with a lot of hair!
customer_reviews.text: This works SO well for both of my girls’ hair. My 2 year old has hair down to the middle of her back and baby shampoo dries it out and makes it tangle but she cries if regular shampoo gets in her eyes. This seems to be tear free and smells awesome. Even my 7 year old is using it with her very thick wavy hair and her hair is smooth and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: janaeashley

customer_reviews.title: Meh at YIKES prices
customer_reviews.text: My kid has goreous hair. Gorgeous. Like spun golden silk. We have tried about 20 different shampoos on her in her short 5 years and this one was middle of the pack. Actually kind of dries it out a bit. No volume, no shine. It ranks as slightly better than the shampoo at the gym in the dispenser and, considering the cost, that's not cool, man. There are plenty that are better at half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Remoto

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo, it made a huge difference after only one wash!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is really good! I noticed a huge difference in my daughter’s hair after only one use. It’s fuller,shinier and it smells amazing! I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Monika Ilieva

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it helped my toddler's hair hydrate more than the usual baby wash, but it is still tear-free, so is great for little ones!! It's huge and she doesn't need a lot of product, so it will last a long time, too! The scent is also nice and mild for her sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Jean

customer_reviews.title: Tear free and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!! My little one was getting a little to thick of hair to use her previous shampoo but not old enough for adult shampoo so I found this! Tear free, helped with the dandruff she was having and I love the scent and how soft it makes her hair!
customer_reviews.author: Mischa Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Happy & satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Smells good & it is really tear free. I have some products here on Amazon that says tear free but my 2 todllers still complain that their eyes hurt everytime I wash off their shampoo. And this is the only tear free shampoo that haven't complain with. I also love the scent. Its gentle smell
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Marian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my 5 year old, it smells a little like honey to me and I am a honey lover. I wish I could find a matching conditioner, she has long thick hair that tangles easily. Will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: harry bogdanos

customer_reviews.title: Great for cradle cap!
customer_reviews.text: Could t get rid of my daughters cradle cap, this was magic. Plus the smell is great. My oldest has curly hair and works awesome on her.
customer_reviews.author: Ayleen

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and doesn't burn eyes
customer_reviews.text: Originally received a bottle of this as a gift for my daughter, now I can't even think of using any other shampoo. It doesn't burn her eyes and it smells AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: ThugWife4Life

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this shampoo leaves my daughter’s hair. Smell is pretty good, rinses clean and no tears! Just a little pricy for kids shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Baby love it. Smells amazing! Doesn't hurt his skin or eyes. Little bit goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Yes it works and yes it’s great
customer_reviews.text: Only shampoo I use with my kids they have sensitive skin and are prone to rashes but not with this I have 3 kids ages 7,5,3 and they all use it
customer_reviews.author: Micheal c

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for our kids, after finding out about the things they put in Johnson and Johnson products we went to this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product because had such great reviews and I really thought it would work for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because had such great reviews and I really thought it would work for my daughters hair. It smells really good but unfortunately it dries out her hair and after 1 day hair looks greasy. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nyc

customer_reviews.title: So happy to find this online
customer_reviews.text: Our kids’ barber stopped selling this, and it was the only thing that helped keep cradle cap at bay. Much cheaper on here (of course,) too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Gable

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shampoo for children
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great shampoo for children. Wonderful, clean scent. Doesn't burn the eyes. Would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane A. Quincy

customer_reviews.title: Great product of you are looking for a better kids option.
customer_reviews.text: This works well in the girls’ hair. The no tear formula works well. Better quality than J and J.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No a baby but still use it.
customer_reviews.text: As an adult I find that regular shampoo is to harsh. This is gentle on my natural hair after an ACV rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Fresh Face Makeup Artistry

customer_reviews.title: Looooove
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo for my long haired 14 month old! Smells great and it doesnt bother her eyes! Leaves her hair smooth and tangle free!
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: Our new standard
customer_reviews.text: Use for my young boys, no tears and cleans softly and nice price
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great value !
customer_reviews.text: This is the only shampoo that works on my son’s hair ! I even use it sometimes on my hair ! Nice smell too !
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Even though this isn’t a cheap product but it’s definitely worth the price. I love the scent so does my toddler and loves how good it cleans his hair. I have tried a lot of shampoo’s for his hair and this is hands down the best so far and I would definitely repurchase it!
customer_reviews.author: Daljit Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully gentle shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good and does a wonderful, gentle cleaning job. I bought it for the grandbaby, but love it for myself too!
customer_reviews.author: MARYSMONSON

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Paul Mitchell is one of my favorite brands for hair care. The products are consistently excellent. I use this shampoo on my 7 year old son and 4 year old daughters hair. Their hair is in excellent shape and it truly does not burn their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe @ blessed and bewildered

customer_reviews.title: Just great
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo was just what the Dr ordered and has been wonderful for my hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo for kids etc....
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s favorite shampoo—smells so good—I’ve used it too and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Khaleesi

customer_reviews.title: Works great for long hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this - makes my daughters long hair shiny and manageable
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen G

customer_reviews.title: Love this soft scent.
customer_reviews.text: Love smelling all my babies heads after using this. Will be a staple in our house now.
customer_reviews.author: Amber moore

customer_reviews.title: I finally got one of these bottles and the smell is amazing! ( Burt’s bees has no scent)
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Burt’s bees for years. I finally got one of these bottles and the smell is amazing! ( Burt’s bees has no scent) :( a little product goes a long way!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, parents love to use it!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great for all 3 of my kids. My daughter with very sensitive skin even does well with this. The only shampoo we will use for them!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo for my 3 year old. Was noticing all the previous shampoos I bought for her was making her hair dry and frizzy. Paul Mitchell's baby dont cry did a complete 360 on her hair. It no longer looks frizzy or dry!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Southerly

customer_reviews.title: Great for curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has springy curls that tangle easily. Baby shampoos (Johnsons, Suave) didn't do a whole lot for us, and with swimming in chlorinated water in the summer, we needed a quality shampoo. This shampoo is great, it is adult quality, without sacrificing a tear-less formula. We do use conditioner sometimes in addition to this product, but it works fine either way. If you are going to buy this economy size, definitely invest in the pump, as slippery hands don't mix well with such a large bottle.
customer_reviews.author: DE-Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good for
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a few different baby washes, this is so far the only one I’ve found that doesn’t irritate my baby’s eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great transition product
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great product to transition my 3 year olds from baby shampoo to real shampoo. I will say I still do feel like the need some conditioner especially at the ends of their hair. This is absolutely tear free and has a great scent!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor N.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It smells good. When you use it to wash your hair, you feel soft and gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Bottle
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was broken and the contents spilled out. Amazon box was intact, so I am assuming it was product-related.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but cant use it.
customer_reviews.text: Personally I love the product, sadly my daughter is allergic to it. She breaks out in tiny blisters all over her head.
customer_reviews.author: BigNaughti

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 my son ins't allergic to.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. It's the only one we can use. The bottle leaked a lot during shipping though....... Do you have a better way to secure the lid for shipping?
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Burger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo for my curly hair toddlers, gentle, smells great, and used together with the conditioning spray, we are tangle free with soft hair. Definitely hooked.
customer_reviews.author: SarahBeth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shampoo. First shampoo my son did not cry ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shampoo. First shampoo my son did not cry with when it got onto his scalp. Really feels like you are cleaning their hair and keeps the curls! We have tried a few others like mixed chicks and Shea, but this one works the best for us!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best scent ever
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite baby shampoo. Used it for all 4 children. My oldest is now 16, youngest is 1
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ragusa

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Baby Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love the cent of this baby shampoo and I'm so excited that Paul Mitchell has a kids shampoo! So fancy!
customer_reviews.author: kittie0807

customer_reviews.title: Tear free
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Good for her very thick hair. Was using adult shampoo and it was a battle due to her fear of soap in the eyes. Works well & smells fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Carl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very good product for kids and the price for the size is so good
customer_reviews.author: Fernadno Romero

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have four kids ranging from two years old up to twenty two! I used this shampoo with ALL of them! So happy Paul Mitchell still makes it.
customer_reviews.author: Susie P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and gives the hair a nice look. I'd recommend the conditioning spray to go with it, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this for my daughter. Pleasant aroma. Leaves her hair soft and clean. Gentle but effective.
customer_reviews.author: Kamran S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo.  No tears.  Great pricing.
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing deal! So much cheaper and much easier to buy online. Great shampoo. No tears.
customer_reviews.author: vtfirefighter32

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo ever I remember when I was just a ...
customer_reviews.text: Best Shampoo ever I remember when I was just a baby when my mother bought me this shampoo and now I'm a father myself and I get it for my child now . Lol Anyways one of the best right here.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T

customer_reviews.title: Bang for my bucks!
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain. I compared it against a the shampoo that I purchased from a professional salon and it appears to be authentic. Thanks My Beauty Center!
customer_reviews.author: DarlingDarrien

customer_reviews.title: Very nice scent.
customer_reviews.text: It was for my grand daughter. I love the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Maher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gets the stink out of my boys hair but doesn't bother their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids soft hair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small kids. No tears at all when it runs to their eyes. Love the scent and keeps their hair soft
customer_reviews.author: On the go mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The big bottle is very convenient. Stores do not carry it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Seabold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Smells great. Makes my kids' hair nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: dmb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I love using it on my children. It doesn't leave their hair feeling dry and brittle. A little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: mommy of three

customer_reviews.title: Love love love got rid of that baby acne and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love love love got rid of that baby acne and dry cheeks. But be advised it doesn't have that baby smell we all love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son has very sensitive skin so those shampoo works well for him. Thanks, John.
customer_reviews.author: Johansen Marine MGMT

customer_reviews.title: Good for itchy scalp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an itchy scalp, it helped a lot... Much more than any other shampoo I found but in the end I still went to the dermatologist. It was reasonably priced but it did make my hair a little frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: lalalauren

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend This
customer_reviews.text: Best shampoo and body wash for my little girl! Definitely helping her cradle cap go away. Plus she smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara J. Danieli

customer_reviews.title: Makes my daughters hair so healthy
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo was recommended by our salon. My daughter used it and not only does her hair look healthy and shiny, it started growing great and gaining thickness. We will not use anything else
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna

customer_reviews.title: Daily follow up of the package/delivery status.
customer_reviews.text: I like the daily (almost) follow up e-mails giving status. Also the delivery man put it in my mailbox, which was good since I was not at home when the deliveryman came here. The packages was well made to prevent damage to the goods. <the product has been used by my wife (for herself) since late last year. In general we are pleased with the product and the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Eivind Schei

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this shampoo because my 2yr old little girl needed big girl shampoo for her hair. We use it on all of our kiddos our 3 yr old down to our newborn and we love it. Gentle enough for the baby and strong enough to tame the little girls hair. Their hair comes out with a beautiful shine and great managability. No more dull, limp hair here.
customer_reviews.author: whitetree

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids. Using it for shampoo and body wash.
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Finally a shampoo that is tear-free
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo was recommended by a stylist at our salon, I will be buying this all the time for my son. The formula is ph-balanced so it is actually tear-free, unlike J&J which basically has a numbing agent and can cause eye irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my 2 year old and one bottle lasted over a year
customer_reviews.author: georgia29

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Kids Don't Cry Shampoo, but received something totally different instead The Paul Mitchell Clarifying Shampoo Two. It only just arrived and I have not yet started the return procedures, but I am not a happy customer.......
customer_reviews.author: ken emerson

customer_reviews.title: one of few coconut free shampoo's!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl and I have a coconut allergy and as a result, we cannot use anything that has coconut in it. After much review, I came across this shampoo and bought some. No itching afterwards and it smells great! I don't like that it isn't all natural but it was the best that I could find that was/is coconut and palm free.
customer_reviews.author: purple cat

product_meta.title: Paul Mitchell Baby Don't Cry Shampoo
product_meta.description:
Size:33.8 Fl. OzKeep bath time fun with Paul Mitchell Baby Don't Cry Shampoo, a baby shampoo that gently cleanses hair while being tear-free. Great for children of all ages, this gentle cleanser has a neutral pH that makes it tearless as well as a unique blend of extracts that help to hydrate and prevent moisture loss. Chamomile and coneflower extracts calm and soothe. Fragrance: Calming fruity scent with soft accents of rose and amber.

BRAND STORY
Paul Mitchell is results-driven hair care from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
